H0.text: What is a system of muscle-building without moving joints. Static Contraction

H1.text: What is a system of muscle-building without moving joints. Kinetic Tension

H2.text: What is a system of muscle-building without moving joints. Myotonic Training

H3.text: What is a system of muscle-building without moving joints. Isometrics

A4.text: isometrics involve the static contraction of a muscle without any visible movement in the angle of the joint.

A5.text: NASA concluded that isometrics may not be the best way for astronauts to maintain muscle tissue.

A6.text: The isometric preloading of muscles is instinctively performed in order to generate power to be used in subsequent dynamic movements.

A7.text: Isometric training is rarely used by itself and it is usually incorporated into a wider training regime.

A8.text: How to Exercise Without Moving a Muscle
